con:configuration.scriptText: import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def ResponseMessage = messageExchange.response.responseContent def jsonSlurper = new JsonSlurper().parseText(ResponseMessage) def ResponseHeaders = messageExchange.responseHeaders assert !(jsonSlurper.isEmpty()) assert (jsonSlurper.orderBookStatus == "Open")

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def ResponseMessage = messageExchange.response.responseContent def jsonSlurper = new JsonSlurper().parseText(ResponseMessage) def ResponseHeaders = messageExchange.responseHeaders assert !(jsonSlurper.isEmpty()) assert (jsonSlurper.orderId != 0) assert (jsonSlurper.order.price == 300) assert (jsonSlurper.executionPrice == 0) assert (jsonSlurper.order.quantity == 30) assert (jsonSlurper.allocatedQuantity == 0) assert (jsonSlurper.order.instrumentId == 1) assert (jsonSlurper.orderType == "LimitOrder") assert (jsonSlurper.order.entryDate == "20-01-2019")
